select
from wp_goods_attention where id in #{id}

select c.* , a.name , a.sn , a.price , a.marketPrice , a.type , a.isMarketable , CONCAT( (select setvalue from shared_system_set where setKey = 'imageUrl') , CONCAT(CONCAT((select woi.groupName from wp_goods_images woi where woi.goodsId=a.id order by woi.createDate desc limit 1), '/')) , (select woi.url from wp_goods_images woi where woi.goodsId=a.id order by woi.createDate desc limit 1) ) as image from wp_goods_attention c left join wp_goods a on c.goodsId = a.id ${condition}

select c.*,a.name,a.sn,a.price,a.marketPrice, CONCAT((SELECT setvalue FROM shared_system_set WHERE setKey='imageUrl'),CONCAT(CONCAT(groupName,'/'),d.url)) AS image from wp_goods_attention c LEFT JOIN wp_goods a ON c.goodsId = a.id LEFT JOIN wp_goods_images d ON d.goodsId = a.id ${condition}
select count(id) as result from wp_goods_attention where tenantId = #{tenantId}
select count(id) as result from wp_goods_attention where tenantId = #{tenantId} and ${property}=#{value}

select c.*,a.name,a.sn,a.price,a.marketPrice, CONCAT((SELECT setvalue FROM shared_system_set WHERE setKey='imageUrl'),CONCAT(CONCAT(groupName,'/'),d.url)) AS image from wp_goods_attention c LEFT JOIN wp_goods a ON c.goodsId = a.id LEFT JOIN wp_goods_images d ON d.goodsId = a.id where c.memberId = #{memberId} order by c.createDate desc /*limit 0,6 */
